collection.name: Scaredy Cat
collection.openText: Can I follow you forever? So I can tear them apart...

specialTipSize.specialTip: The amount of PE-Boxes $0 produced differed if F-01-25, F-05-32, F-01-87 existed within the facility. These three Abnormalities were dubbed 'Friends'.
The amount of 'Friends' within the facility affected its Work Success rate. If no 'Friends' were present within the facility, it became extremely nervous and the Work Success rate was abysmal.
When a 'Friend' breached containment, $0 breached with them. $0 regenerated all injuries sustained at extreme speed if any other 'Friend' was still breaching.
